snippet: The total of millennials — those born from 1981 to 1997 — will reach 75.3 million, overtaking baby boomers (1946 to 1964) as the United States’ largest living generation.
abstract: Researchers predict that millennials, or people born between 1981 and 1997, will reach 75.3 million in United States during 2015, overtaking baby boomers; swelling numbers are in part due to immigration; it can be difficult, however, to determine who belongs to which generation.
lead_paragraph: The total of millennials — those born from 1981 to 1997 — will reach 75.3 million, overtaking baby boomers (1946 to 1964) as the United States’ largest living generation.

headline.print_headline: Millennials Set to Outnumber Baby Boomers
headline.main: Millennials Set to Outnumber Baby Boomers
